What are acne scars?

Acne scars are depressions left behind by active acne on the skin. These can be treated only through collagen induction by different procedures. Topical creams or mild treatments like peels are ineffective.

Do acne scars fade with time?

Scars once formed tend to persist. They can be treated using in clinic procedures.

How can I remove my acne scars?

Acne sacrs can be removed mainly via three procedures:
  • 1. Micro needling RF (Ednymed Intensif)
    Endymed Intensif is a minimally invasive procedure. It combines micro needling and radiofrequency to work at deeper levels of your skin. The procedure involves the application of a numbing cream for half an hour. Post this the treatment is carried out by our doctor and it takes around half an hour to complete the procedure. The endymed intensif probe has multiple ultra-fine needles which penetrate the skin to reach the deeper layer of the skin and deliver heat at this level, which initiates the natural healing process. Also, the 300 microns needles ensure that there is no bleeding throughout the procedure.
    Are there any side effects of Endymed MNRF? EndyMed’s unique 3DEEP RF technology, the Intensif ensures that the superficial skin is not damaged throughout the procedure. This leads to lesser downtime and no side effects. Is MNRF painful? If you are scared with the thought of needles, rest assured that this is going to be a smooth experience for you. Unlike the other microneedling treatments, Endymed Intensif is much less painful, The gold-plated tapered non insulated microneedles need fewer passes per treatment, thus reducing the treatment time and having much less discomfort. The microneedles are very thin (300 microns) and cause minimal pain How many sessions of Microneedling RF would be needed for treating acne scars? We generally recommed a minimum of 4-6 sessions to see great results. However, the requirement varies from patient to patient. You would undergo a consultation first to customise the treatment according to the severity of your scars. What is the gap between MNRF sessions? A minimum gap of 4 weeks is recommended between two sittings. How soon can I expect to see results? The results would start becoming visible after 8-10 weeks from the first procedure. Are the effects permanent? Yes. The effects achieved are through the normal healing response of your own collagen and therefore are permanent. What are the post procedure instructions?
    1. You might experience mild itching, redness or swelling on treated area for next 24-48 hours
    2. Use only cleanser, moisturiser and sunscreen on treated area for 03 days post procedure.
    3. Don’t use any scrubs, loofahs, facial steamers, anti acne creams, serums, anti- aging creams or any other ointments prescribed to you other than moisturiser and sunscreen for 03 days post procedure.
    4. Do not tweeze, rub, pick, bleach, wax or exfoliate the treated area for 1 week post procedure.
    5. Do not take any other treatments like laser, peeling, medifacial/medispa, for 1 week post procedure.
    6. Use moisturiser and sunscreen every 4-5 hourly and avoid activities involving prolonged direct sun exposure like swimming, hiking for 03 days post procedure.
  • 2. Pixel erbium laser
    What is pixel erbium laser? Pixel Er laser is the latest generation of Erbium fractional lasers, with combined fractional technology and ablative effect of Erbium YAG laser. Micro-ablative columns of laser penetrate deep into the skin and create a controlled trauma below the skin Are there any side effects of Pixel Ebium laser? Erbium laser causes much less damage to the superficial skin as compared to CO2 lasers. Hence, the chances of side effects in Indian skin (especially darkening of the skin) are minimal. What to Expect During Erbium Laser procedure? Before the treatment begins, the skin is cleansed and a numbing cream would be applied and kept for 30-45 minutes. The treatment would be carried out by our doctors and would take around 20-30 minutes depending upon the area to be treated. Is the erbium laser treatment painful? No, you will be comfortable throughout the procedure. The numbing cream makes sure that there is minimal pain. What is the post procedure care?
    1. Avoid sun completely for the next 5 days.
    2. You might experience mild itching, redness or swelling on treated area for next 24-48 hours
    3. Use only cleanser, moisturiser and sunscreen on treated area for 07 days post procedure.
    4. Don’t use any scrubs, loofahs, facial steamers, anti acne creams, serums, anti- aging creams or any other ointments prescribed to you other than moisturiser and sunscreen for 03 days post procedure.
    5. Do not tweeze, rub, pick, bleach, wax or exfoliate the treated area for 1 week post procedure.
    6. Do not take any other treatments like laser, peeling, medifacial/medispa, for 1 week post procedure.
    7. Use moisturiser and sunscreen every 4-5 hourly and avoid activities involving prolonged direct sun exposure like swimming, hiking for 03 days post procedure.
    How soon do I see results? The improvement in quality of the skin, blemishes, wrinkles starts becoming visible in 3-4 weeks. Improvements in scars are visible after 6-8 weeks. How many sessions would be needed? We recommend at least 4-6 sessions for best results How are the sessions spaced? The sessions are done at a minimum 4 weekly interval
  • 3. Microneedling
    What is Microneedling? Microneedling involves the use of Dermapen to indiuce collagen regeneration below the skin. This leads to a visible improvement in scars. What to Expect During Microneedling procedure? Before the treatment begins, the skin is cleansed and a numbing cream would be applied and kept for 30-45 minutes. The treatment would be carried out by our doctors and would take around 20-30 minutes depending upon the area to be treated. Are there any side effects of Micronnedling? Microneedling leads to minimal bleeding points on the surface of the skin. The skin turns mildly red after the procedure and gradually the redness resolves in the next 24-48 hours. Microneedling causes lesser damage to the superficial skin as compared to lasers. Hence, the chances of side effects in Indian skin (especially darkening of the skin) are minimal. Is the Microneedling treatment painful? No, numbing cream works well for this procedure and there is hardly any pain during the procedure. What is the post procedure care?
    1. You might experience mild itching, redness or swelling on treated area for next 24-48 hours.
    2. Use only cleanser, moisturiser and sunscreen on treated area for 03 days post procedure.
    3. Don’t use any scrubs, loofahs, facial steamers, anti acne creams, serums, anti- aging creams or any other ointments prescribed to you other than moisturiser and sunscreen for 03 days post procedure.
    4. Do not tweeze, rub, pick, bleach, wax or exfoliate the treated area for 01 week post Procedure.
    5. Do not take any other treatments like laser, peeling, medifacial/medispa, for 01 week post procedure.
    6. Use moisturiser and sunscreen every 4-5 hourly and avoid activities involving prolonged direct sun exposure like swimming, hiking for 03 days post procedure.
    How soon do I see results? The improvement in quality of the skin, blemishes, wrinkles starts becoming visible in 3-4 weeks. Improvements in scars are visible only after 6-8 weeks. How many sessions would be needed? We recommend at least 4-6 sessions for best results How are the sessions spaced? The sessions are done at a minimum 3-4 weekly interval
